testcase.classname: US_002 SSN, Mobil Phone, Email Charecter Control test
testcase.name: US02TC02 user must enter valid data into SSN TextBox using "-" character.
testcase.failure:
Given SSN user is on "http://gmibank.com/" page.............................passed And SSN user click on User button...........................................passed And SSN user clicks Registration tab........................................passed And SSN click on SSN TextBox................................................passed And SSN the user must type the character "-" when entering a number into the current SSN TextBox..passed Then SSN the user should not see the text "Your SSN is invalid".............failed
